eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Shasta, CA; at 01:16 AM ON DEC 18, 2025 Effective until 02:16 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: THIS IS A TEST OF THE EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM FOR SHASTA COUNTY. IN THE EVENT OF AN ACTUAL EMERGENCY, TUNE TO THIS STATION FOR IMPORTANT INFORMATION
